subject: Penis power
body:
Looking for an effective and cheap solution to have sex like you had 10 years ago?
Go to the shop
Make your life better. Even your sexual partner won't know you are using Viagra if you buy it here.
Go to the shop
Just buy medication called Viagra or Cialis and you'll have unbelievable sex 24/7!!!
With best regards,
Adam Riggs
 
 
A esli ia ne zhelal o chem-to dumat, mne eto obychno udavalos. Ne bylo takoj vozmozhnosti. Ia netoroplivo Podnialsia, Klinok prygnul rukoiatiu v ladon, nalivaias purpurnym svecheniem. Eiu celikom Zavladelo potriasenie, navalilos na nee, kak mnogotonnyj kamen, i ia oshchutil, kak Sminaetsia ee volia, slovno miagkij vosk, kak temneet razum, slovno koster, Zalivaemyj silnym holodnym dozhdem. 
My tut poka svoi dela obsudim. Pokazalos? Neskolko sekund ia pristalno vsmatrivalsia v Temnotu. U Onni vyrvalsia nervnyj smeshok. Inogda ob etom vse zhe stoit govorit, on snova usmehnulsia. I ia dolzhen proverit tebia! pronzitelno kriknul on, vskidyvaia mech. Prokliatyj gorod, pust tebia poraziat vse Neschastia mira, esli oni uzhe ne sdelali etogo! Steny, skoree vsego, ne zashchitili by ot sokrushitelnoj sily reptilii, no Na kakoe-to vremia, poka ona probivalas by skvoz nih, smogli by ee Zaderzhat. Istinnyj Svet, kak zhe strashno Vse povernulos. Tak skazat, zadacha-minimum. 
Kazalos by, shansy ravny, esli by ne odno no Strazh ne ustaval. Gront dlia nego sejchas byl strashnee liubogo porozhdeniia Tmy, tem bolee chto i etogo Niksarda poblizosti bylo ne vidat, kuda-to uzhe Smylsia. Ia ne stal popravliat. Tebe nadezhda Nuzhna bolshe, chem mne. ejisuminyon X1BcRlxCXUV0QllXUkAbREVSQFBDXlxbG1JT
